mapper.insert: insert into mc_member (id, `name`, age, gender, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update mc_member set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=BIT}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, age, gender, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from mc_member where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, `name`, age, gender, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from mc_member
